title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practice Competencies: Deliberate Practice for High-Quality CPR Training

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can maintain a chest compression depth of at least 5 cm and the correct rate of 100–120 compressions per minute during CPR performance.
Learners can improve quality metrics—such as compression depth, rate, and recoil—by over 80% using a real-time feedback system.
Learners can reproduce high-quality CPR skills with over 90% accuracy after a 6-month course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
